Intro: 01 Basic Mustache

Intro

Ractive uses {{ foo }} mustache notation to indicate data interpolation. It can be used in element attributes and as element "content"

<h1 style='color: {{color}};'>Hello {{person}}</h1>

<input>

For two-way binding, the most basic binding is to an <input> control, which uses the value attribute, or the checked attribute for checkboxes:

<input value='{{value}}'>
<input type='checkbox' checked='{{on}}'>
